text: Mauritania has 15 regions: Regions Map key Name Native name Capital Area Population (2013) 1 Adrar Atar 62,658 2 Assaba Kiffa 325,897 3 Brakna Aleg 312,277 4 Dakhlet Nouadhibou Nouadhibou 123,779 5 Gorgol Kaédi 335,917 6 Guidimaka Sélibaby 267,029 7 Hodh Ech Chargui Néma 430,668 8 Hodh El Gharbi Ayoun el Atrouss 294,109 9 Inchiri Akjoujt 19,639 10 Nouakchott-Nord Dar-Naim 366,912 10 Nouakchott-Ouest Tevragh-Zeina 165,814 10 Nouakchott-Sud Arafat 425,673 11 Tagant Tidjikja 80,962 12 Tiris Zemmour Zouérat 53,261 13 Trarza Rosso 272,773. Mauritania occupied part of Western Sahara from 1975 to 1979. While there, its part of the area was called Tiris al-Gharbiyya. The regions are split into 44 departments.
title: Regions of Mauritania
